itemDescription: British scholar, martial artist and grandmaster (Gurdev) of the ancient Indian martial art of Shastar Vidya

wikipedia_page.main: Nidar Singh Nihang (Punjabi: ਨਿਡਰ ਸਿੰਘ ਨਿਹੰਗ; born 1967 in Wolverhampton) is a British scholar, martial artist and grandmaster (Gurdev) of the ancient Indian martial art of Shastar Vidya.
